desc: Get thicker, longer hair with Undetectable HD Lace Wigs, Closure & Frontal from Vicky Boateng. Huge range of Wigs , Hair products and bundles.

layout.text: Gorgeous handmade wigs that you won’t be able to tell isn’t your own natural hair. High-quality full lace and frontal lace wigs made of natural human virgin hair, 180% hair density
